messages.title: SUPPORTING THE COMMUNITY
messages.content: An MP’s most important job is to make sure that people’s views are heard and that they are treated fairly. I will continue to work to ensure that local concerns like crime, housing and social care, as well as matters like flooding and coastal erosion, are addressed and action taken.

messages.title: BACKING LOCAL BUSINESS
messages.content: Small businesses are the lifeblood of this area, providing jobs and prosperity. A Conservative Government will prioritise policies that promote long term economic stability and invest in our infrastructure.

messages.title: INVESTING IN SCHOOLS AND HOSPITALS
messages.content: I helped ensure fairer funding in local schools, and strongly back Boris Johnson’s promise to increase health spending by £33.9billion by 2023. Only a Conservative Government delivering a strong economy can ensure that the NHS and schools are properly funded.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making sure that local concerns like crime, housing, social care, flooding, and coastal erosion are addressed.
Promoting policies that support small businesses for economic stability and job creation.
Ensuring fair funding for local schools and supporting increased health spending.
